meanings.definition: Not a basic or essential item
meanings.sent1: The fancy decorations were nonstaple for the party.
meanings.sent2: The nonstaple flowers added a unique touch to the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: It was quite amusing to see the nonstaple hat the cat wore.
meanings.sent4: Her nonstaple choice of music made the event unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The nonstaple painting in the gallery caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Not a main or regular food item
meanings.sent1: The nonstaple dessert was a delightful surprise after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She decided to try a nonstaple dish from the menu.
meanings.sent3: The nonstaple snack made everyone curious about its taste.
meanings.sent4: His nonstaple recipe turned out to be a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The nonstaple ingredient gave the soup a unique flavor.

meanings.definition: Not a necessary or standard supply
meanings.sent1: The nonstaple office equipment was rarely used.
meanings.sent2: She packed some nonstaple items for the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The nonstaple tool in the shed puzzled everyone.
meanings.sent4: His nonstaple method of solving the problem surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nonstaple material was only needed for a special project.
